instructions.title: How To Delete Your Meetup Account
instructions.before: Meetup uses the word Deactivation instead of Deletion, but it is essentially the same thing. Please note, it’s currently only possible to Delete your Meetup account from the desktop web version of Meetup. Plus, you cannot Delete your account from within the mobile app. Follow the steps below to Delete your account.

qnAnswers.question: What happens when I delete my Meetup Account?
qnAnswers.answer: Once your Meetup account is deactivated, it cannot be reinstated. So if you decide you want to come back to Meetup in the future, you’ll need to create a new account at that time.  Once your Meetup account is deactivated, you will no longer receive email or notifications from Meetup and your profile will no longer be visible or accessible.

qnAnswers.question: Can I delete my Meetup Account if I signed up from a third party service like google or facebook?
qnAnswers.answer: If you created your Meetup account through Google or Facebook, you will need to create a Meetup password before you can deactivate your account. To do so, click on the 'Forgot your password prompts on the login page.  To be directed to the forgot password link [please click here] (https://www.meetup.com/account/forgot/).

qnAnswers.question: How do I cancel my Organizer Subscription?
qnAnswers.answer: Go to your [Organizer Subscription homepage](https://www.meetup.com/account/subscription/). Then Click Cancel Subscription.  Since Organizer Subscriptions automatically renew please remember to cancel subscription prior to deletion.

steps: Login to your [Meetup Account] (https://www.meetup.com/). If you are already logged in, doing so will open your Meetup Homepage.
Click the Profile Icon on Top Right
Scroll down and Click Deactivate your Account
This is the Confirmation Message you will receive once your account has been deleted
